mcma.examples.stocks.description: Please provide some valid stock market symbol like:
mcma.examples.stocks.text1: Stock market example shows how to implement
mcma.examples.stocks.text4: Updating symbol query with different symbol will emit action which updates state with loading flag (reducer) and triggers effect for retrieving of selected stock.
mcma.examples.stocks.text5: Actions are debounced and every subsequent request will cancel previous one using
mcma.examples.stocks.text6: Success or error actions are emitted on request completion. Loading spinner is removed and stock info or error message is displayed.
mcma.examples.stocks.title: Stock market

mcma.examples.todos.text3: example with support for adding, toggling, removing and filtering of the todo items.
mcma.examples.todos.text5: module and support for lazy loaded reducers (this is a lazy loaded feature module).
mcma.examples.todos.text6: Todos are persisted into local storage so you should see your todos also on later visits when using the same browser.
